    An interface for saving and loading JSON files

    • Method Detail

      • loadFromFile

        public static javax.json.JsonObject loadFromFile(java.io.File file)
                                          throws java.io.IOException
        Loads a JSON file and returns the root node.
        Parameters:
        file - The JSON file being loaded. Must exist.
        Returns:
        The root node. Must not be null.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If there is an error reading the file.

      • saveToFile

        public static void saveToFile(javax.json.JsonObject obj,
                              java.io.File file)
                       throws java.io.IOException
        Saves a JSON object to a file.
        Parameters:
        file - The file that we're saving to
        obj - The root node. Must not be null.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If there is an error writing the file.
